scripts.alchemy:optimism-goerli: graph deploy perps-market-optimism-goerli subgraph.optimism-goerli.yaml --output-dir ./build/optimism-goerli --version-label v2 --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $SATSUMA_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz
scripts.alchemy:base-goerli-competition: graph deploy perps-market-base-testnet subgraph.base-goerli-competition.yaml --output-dir ./build/base-goerli-competition --version-label v4 --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $SATSUMA_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz
scripts.alchemy:base-goerli-andromeda: graph deploy perps-market-base-goerli-andromeda subgraph.base-goerli-andromeda.yaml --output-dir ./build/base-goerli-andromeda --version-label v1 --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $SATSUMA_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz
scripts.coverage: yarn deployments:optimism-goerli && yarn codegen:optimism-goerli && git diff --exit-code && yarn test --coverage
